titleStmt.title: An ordinance of the Lords & Commons assembled in Parliament for the leaving of moneys by way of excise or new-impost as well for the better securing of trade, as for the maintenance of the army raised by the Parliament and payment of the debts of the Commonwealth : wherein the said Lords and Commons have thought fit to alter the rates printed in a former ordinance : and to impose other and lower charges upon the severall commodities herein expressed, as by a schedule hereunto annexed appeareth.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes and John Raworth,

notesStmt.note: "In this schedule are contained the excise and new-impost"--p. 3-2 [ie. 18]
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
With: An ordinance and declaration of the Lord[s] and Commons assembled in Parliament touching the salary and allowance to be made to the commissioners and auditors of the excise--p. 15 [ie. 19]
